name: future_sight
description: A huge package covering Future Sight’s futureshifted mechanics and evergreen keywordings: Absorb, Aura swap, Delve, Fateseal, Fortify/Fortification, Frenzy, Grandeur, Gravestorm, Poisonous, Transfigure, plus keyworded Deathtouch, Lifelink, Reach, Shroud and friends. Includes Suspend/Vanishing support, typecycling variants, Sliver and Wizard nods, and colorless-spell previews.

Creature: Grandeur — Discard another card with the same name as this card: Put two +1/+1 counters on {THIS}.
Grandeur — Discard another card with the same name as this card: {THIS} gains lifelink and deathtouch until end of turn.
Grandeur — Discard another card with the same name as this card: Create two tapped Treasure tokens.
Grandeur — Discard another card with the same name as this card: Return {THIS} from your graveyard to your hand.

Typecycling — {TYPE_CYCLING_TYPE}cycling {TYPE_CYCLING_COST}. ({TYPE_CYCLING_COST}, Discard this card: Search your library for a {TYPE_CYCLING_TYPE} card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
Vanishing {VANISHING_N}. (This permanent enters with {VANISHING_N} time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
Instant: Prevent the next {N} damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
Exile target attacking or blocking creature.
Artifact: Fortify {FORTIFY_COST}. (Attach to target land you control. Fortify only as a sorcery.)
Fortified land has "{T}: Add {N} mana of any one color."
Fortified land has "{T}: Target creature gets +{N}/+{N} until end of turn."
Whenever fortified land becomes tapped, {TRIGGER}: {THIS} deals {N} damage to any target.
Land: {T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Add {N}.
{T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. Spend this mana only to cast spells with delve.
{T}: Target player fateseals 1.

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell,
Whenever a creature you control dies,
